original_title: TMZ Presents Johnny Vs. Amber: From Love to Hate
overview: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's relationship went from white-hot love to red-hot anger. The documentary highlights the most gripping moments of the trial and their relationship with interviews and information TMZ reported while chronicling the marriage, divorce and numerous allegations of violence.
title: TMZ Presents Johnny Vs. Amber: From Love to Hate
